that seemed to holler to all their doubters, "Take that!" "We just wanted to show the whole Metta World Peace we could play together," Carmelo Anthony said after the duo's triumphant debut Monday night. We know there's a lot of doubt about that. Carmelo Anthony scored 28 points in his return from a 15-game suspension for fighting and Allen Iverson added 23 in the Denver Nuggets' 115-98 rout of the Memphis Grizzlies. The two are out to prove two superstars can coexist.
